mdRecord.dcterms:description: The first of its kind constructed entirely of poured concrete, using coquina as aggregate. Also one of the first buildings in the county wired for electricity at construction. Opened January 1888; closed 1967. Opened 1968 as main administration building of Flagler College. [work]
